column5: Thank you to all of the members to OFC for making this past year a great one. The stories and inspiration that cross these pages make me proud to be here. The willingness to give advise and a helping hand in the world is getting rarer these days but as long as it is continues to grow and is strong here we will keep the lights on.  Merry Christmas to all and a Prosperous New Year   Art
Art,    Merry Christmas to all and a Prosperous New Year
Have a merry and safe Christmas!
Art, thank YOU for your devoted work here!All the best,  Doug
Thank you for the kind words.  Merry Christmas to you & your family!
Merry Christmas Art and please pass this greeting along to your brother Joe please.Cheers

It is you that we owe a thanks to Art. Without you guys there wouldn't be a place we could bit%$ and moan about. I still think people here are willing to give advice and help each other. Merry Christmas to you as well as the rest of the OFC staffers.
I know the Hydro 1 forestry grew were sent to North Bay on Dec 24. Not a thing on news when 100,000 are without power.
